duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately respond to questions and assist customers with product features, installation, set-up, and troubleshooting of software via phone or in person.
Diagnose, analyze, and correct customer reported hardware issues including PC, laptop, phone (VoIP), email, and network connectivity.
Ensure compliance with all Bank policies and procedures, as well as all applicable state and federal banking rules and/or regulations.
Performing scheduled software/hardware system checks & upgrades and train others outside the department regarding troubleshooting techniques.

Provide technical support to employees and customers using phone, email, and ticketing system; communicate with clients and maintain and constantly improve client service, perception, and satisfaction.
Develop expertise in in-house applications and perform issue identification, verification, diagnosis, and troubleshooting.
Facilitate feedback loop between end-users, IT team, and other business functions; Installation, configuration, maintenance, and tracking of computers, telephones, and peripheral devices.
Conduct user training on hardware, software systems & peripheral devices; develop in-depth knowledge of the service offerings and how it relates to client's needs.
Document internal processes and procedures related to duties and responsibilities; Other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: A degree in Computer Technology or related discipline; or an equivalent combination of experience and education.
